Name: Nonogram - Master's Legacy
About the game: Nonograms, also known as Picross or Griddlers, are picture logic puzzles in which cells in a grid must be colored or left blank according to numbers at the side of the grid to reveal a hidden picture. Â© Wiki Master's Legacy Excellent attempt in a world of Nonogram/Picross puzzles. Galore of levels, multiple game modes along with level editor & workshop would never disappoint any puzzle fan. Features Totally free - Starter Pack, Community Levels & Level Editor are available for everybody. Gorgeous Starter Pack - perfect 15 Nonogram levels to get you started and tease your brain for more adventure. Multiple DLC's with different game modes and level styles. Completed all levels? Don't worry! We have an endless list of user-made paintings, you'll never feel lonely. You should love to paint, do you? Go on and try our awesome level editor (up to 100x100 size), show those impostors who is the Greatest One here! Art design - clean and beautiful. Relaxing ambient soundtracks will keep your mind sharp and focused. Disclaimer - Master's Legacy is free version of The Greatest Painter. Master's Legacy's DLCs contains all puzzles from Nonogram - The Greatest Painter.
